Module edu.citadel.cvm
Package edu.citadel.cvm.assembler.ast

Class InstructionLOAD

java.lang.Object
edu.citadel.cvm.assembler.ast.AST
edu.citadel.cvm.assembler.ast.Instruction
edu.citadel.cvm.assembler.ast.InstructionOneArg
edu.citadel.cvm.assembler.ast.InstructionLOAD
public class InstructionLOAD extends InstructionOneArg
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction LOAD.

      public void assertOpCode()
